alert.note: Alert for Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 13 at 6:39PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Illinois, including the following counties, Adams and Pike. * WHEN...Until 945 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Payson, Adams, Liberty, Hull, Richfield, Plainville, Kinderhook and Seehorn.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
